title: 3 and Out - Titans SNF Statement, Wrong on Kliff, Bad Cowboys L, Better Off Without OBJ
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Titans SNF Statement, Wrong on Kliff, Bad Cowboys L, Better Off Without OBJ
description:
John reacts to the Titans dominant beating of the Rams, explains why he's ready to admit he was wrong about Kliff Kingsbury, if the Cowboys can rebound from a bad loss to the Broncos, and why the Browns big win over the Bengals proves OBJ wasn't worth the headache. Subscribe NOW! Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
